info.name: Sensor Logger
info.summary: Log sensor data to your nextcloud instance
info.description:
SensorLogger for nextcloud enables users to log data provided by sensor devices like humidity, temperature, air quality (voc) or any other type of data send.
INSTALL: https://github.com/alexstocker/sensorlogger/wiki/Install
API: https://github.com/alexstocker/sensorlogger/wiki/API-Calls
SAMPLE USAGE PHP CURL: https://github.com/alexstocker/sensorlogger/tree/master-nc/tests/curl SAMPLE USAGE PYTHON: https://github.com/alexstocker/sensordata
Please report bugs, issues and feature requests to
ISSUES: https://github.com/alexstocker/sensorlogger/issues
Any contributions are welcome!
info.author: HTML5Live
